item.title: Function Hooking Part 1 - Test Program
item.description: I have recently been spending time learning more about reverse engineering and patching applications including fixing older programs that I do not have the source code for. I’ve started looking into function hooking and identifying how it works and different scenarios I could use it. There are a ton of articles online but most of them do not provide simple examples for starters or are focused on Windows API. While Windows API hooking is useful, I am more interested in hooking higher level functions.
